title: Trying to add my work details to my phone to allow me to see emails and calendar but not able
content: trying to add a work account but on first try phone would not sync . Having deleted and starting again I have the google circle spinning but nothing is happening . Have been trying to sort for last 2 days. Help wold be much appreciated. Funny thing is my work account is run through google.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
